song.englishname: You Are My All in All

english.segment1: You are my strength when I am weak. You are the treasure that I seek. You are my all in all
english.segment2: Seeking You as a precious jewel. Lord to give up I'd be a fool. You are my all in all
english.segment3: Jesus Lamb of God worthy is your name. Jesus Lamb of God worthy is your name
english.segment4: Taking my sin my cross my shame. Rising again I bless your name. You are my all in all. When I fall down you pick me up. When I am dry You fill my cup. You are my all in all
